alert.note: Alert for Putnam; Rockland; Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 6:06PM EDT until June 02 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Fairfield County in southern Connecticut... Westchester County in southeastern New York... Putnam County in southeastern New York... Rockland County in southeastern New York... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 605 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mahopac, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Peekskill around 625 PM EDT. Yorktown Heights around 630 PM EDT. Mount Kisco around 650 PM EDT. Ossining and Haverstraw around 700 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
